INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT(PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_MANUFACTURE_DATE, PRODUCT_EXPIRATION_DATE, PRODUCT_ONELINE_INFORMATION, PRODUCT_INFORMATION, PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL_NAME, PRODUCT_MAIN_IMAGE_NAME, PRODUCT_SALE_PERCENT, PRODUCT_TODAY_SALE, PRODUCT_OPEN_HOURS, MEMBER_NUMBER) VALUES(#{productNumber}, #{productName}, #{productCategory}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productManufactureDate}, #{productExpirationDate}, #{productOnelineInfo}, #{productInformation}, #{productThumbnailName}, #{productMainImageName}, #{productSalePercent}, #{productTodaySale}, #{productOpenHours}, #{productMemberNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME=#{productName}, PRODUCT_CATEGORY=#{productCategory}, PRODUCT_PRICE=#{productPrice}, PRODUCT_STOCK=#{productStock}, PRODUCT_MANUFACTURE_DATE=#{productManufactureDate}, PRODUCT_EXPIRATION_DATE=#{productExpirationDate}, PRODUCT_ONELINE_INFORMATION=#{productOnelineInfo}, PRODUCT_INFORMATION=#{productInformation}, PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL_NAME='썸네일이미지', PRODUCT_MAIN_IMAGE_NAME='본문이미지', PRODUCT_REGIST_DATE=SYSDATE, PRODUCT_MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE, PRODUCT_SALE_PERCENT=#{productSalePercent}, PRODUCT_TODAY_SALE=#{productTodaySale}, PRODUCT_OPEN_HOURS=#{productOpenHours}, PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE=#{productSalePrice} WHERE PRODUCT_NUMBER = #{productNumber}
